#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;

int main(){
    int t,n,d,i=0,ans=0,result=0,break_time=0,temp;
    cin>>t;
    for(;t>0;t--){
        cin>>n>>d;
        break_time = (n-1)*10;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++){
            cin>>temp;
            ans= ans+temp;
        }
        result = ans+break_time;
        if(result<=d){
            result = (d-result)/5;
            result = result + (break_time/5);
            cout<<result<<"\n";
        }
        else{
            cout<<"-1\n";
        }
        ans=0;
        result=0;
        break_time=0;
        temp=0;
    }
    return 0;
}
